items.question: Como funciona o upgrade?
items.answer: Você pode fazer upgrade a qualquer momento pelo app. O valor é ajustado proporcionalmente ao período restante do seu plano atual.

items.question: Posso fazer downgrade?
items.answer: Sim! Você pode mudar para um plano menor a qualquer momento. A mudança entra em vigor no próximo ciclo de cobrança.

items.question: Como é a cobrança?
items.answer: A cobrança é mensal, via App Store (iOS) ou Google Play (Android). Você pode cancelar quando quiser, sem multas.

items.question: Preciso de cartão para começar?
items.answer: Não! O plano Free é totalmente gratuito e não exige cadastro de cartão de crédito. Só cadastre quando quiser fazer upgrade.

items.question: O que acontece se ultrapassar os limites?
items.answer: Você receberá um aviso antes de atingir o limite. Se ultrapassar, as novas fotos/checklists ficam pendentes até o upgrade ou próximo mês.

items.question: Qual a diferença entre formulário e checklist?
items.answer: São a mesma coisa! Checklists (ou formulários) são modelos personalizáveis para vistorias, laudos e acompanhamento de serviços.

items.title: Public and transparent pricing
items.description: 90% of competitors hide prices. Here you know exactly what you'll pay.

items.title: Accepts 1 user
items.description: Competitors require a minimum of 4 users. Here you can start alone, if you prefer.

items.title: Truly free plan
items.description: It's not a 14-day trial. It's free forever, with no surprises or hidden charges.

items.title: Complete self-service
items.description: No mandatory demo or salesperson. Download, create your account and start using right away.

items.title: No limit on customers and WOs
items.description: On all plans. Register as many customers and WOs as you need, without paying more for it.

items.title: Easy upgrade and downgrade
items.description: Change plans whenever you want, without bureaucracy. The value is adjusted automatically.

items.question: How does upgrade work?
items.answer: You can upgrade at any time through the app. The value is adjusted proportionally to the remaining period of your current plan.

items.question: Can I downgrade?
items.answer: Yes! You can switch to a smaller plan at any time. The change takes effect in the next billing cycle.

items.question: How is billing done?
items.answer: Billing is monthly, via App Store (iOS) or Google Play (Android). You can cancel anytime, no penalties.

items.question: Do I need a card to start?
items.answer: No! The Free plan is completely free and does not require credit card registration. Only register when you want to upgrade.

items.question: What happens if I exceed the limits?
items.answer: You will receive a warning before reaching the limit. If exceeded, new photos/checklists remain pending until upgrade or next month.

items.question: What's the difference between form and checklist?
items.answer: They're the same thing! Checklists (or forms) are customizable models for inspections, reports and service tracking.
